# tracksTextAttachmentViewBounds

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines the text attachment’s bounds policy.

## Declaration

```swift
var tracksTextAttachmentViewBounds: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `true`, the framework calls the `textAttachment` property’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextAttachmentViewProvider/attachmentBounds(for:location:textContainer:proposedLineFragment:position:)] method and examines the text attachment view provider to determine the bounds instead of using the `bounds` property of this instance. Defaults to `false`.

## Defining the contents

- **location**: The location that indicates the start of the text attachment.
- **textAttachment**: The text attachment for this view.
- **textLayoutManager**: The text layout manager for this view.
- **view**: The text attachment’s view.
